page.title: 12Social Concerns of Congleton
page.content:
Items of News from the{Congleton {Chronicle.}Friday 14th June 1985.
The Chairman of{Congleton}Borough Council's Amenities and Leisure Services Committee Councillor Frank Walton has hit out at the disgusting state of public toilets in{Congleton.
A report before the committee said that the staffing arrangements had now been introduced to provide for the daily cleaning arrangements, and where appropriate night-time security of public toilets.
Furthermore,{Congleton's}Â£9000 new "super loo" in Market Street was opened on Tuesday 11 June 1985.
